bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌼 I collect nectar.
🍯 I make something sweet.
🐝 I start with the letter 'B'.

bug.question: I munch on leaves and turn into a butterfly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I am green and crawly.
🦋 I go through metamorphosis.
🌱 I love to eat plants.

bug.question: I jump very high and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I live in grassy areas.
🟢 I am usually green.
🎶 I am known for my song.

bug.question: I have spots and I'm considered lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am red or orange with black spots.
🍀 Some people believe I bring good fortune.
🪴 I eat aphids.

bug.question: I march in lines and carry food back to my colony. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small and strong.
🏠 I live in an anthill.
💪 I work together with my friends.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I have eight legs.
🕷️ I am an arachnid, not an insect.
🧶 My web is made of silk.

bug.question: I can light up the night with my glowing body. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I use bioluminescence.
🌙 I am active at night.
💡 My light attracts mates.

bug.question: I have large wings with intricate patterns. People like to collect me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 My wings are colorful.
🔒 I start as a caterpillar.
🖼️ Some people display me in frames.

bug.question: I am a master of disguise, resembling a twig or a leaf. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I use camouflage to hide.
🍃 I blend in with the forest.
🌿 I can be green or brown.

bug.question: I am known for my strong jaws and destructive habits. I can damage wood structures. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I eat wood.
🏚️ I can cause damage to houses.
🐜 I live in colonies.

ocean.question: I have a shell and live in the ocean, moving very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am known for being slow.
🏡 I carry my home on my back.
🥬 I might eat seaweed.

ocean.question: I am a big animal that swims in the ocean and spouts water from a hole on my head. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal, not a fish.
🎶 I can sing songs underwater.
💧 I breathe air, just like you.

ocean.question: I'm a colorful fish with venomous spines. I live near coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am often found in warm waters.
🦁 I have a mane-like fringe.
⚠️ Be careful, I can sting you!

ocean.question: I am a sea creature with eight arms and sometimes squirt ink. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have no bones.
🎨 I can change colors to blend in.
👋 I have many arms, but no hands.

ocean.question: I'm a type of large, flat fish that often hides on the ocean floor to surprise prey. What am I?

hints.text: 🍽️ I'm often eaten as a delicacy.
👁️ My eyes are both on the same side of my body.
🏖️ I blend in with the sand.

ocean.question: I am a giant body of saltwater. I cover most of the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🗺️ I am made up of five major ones.
🚢 Boats travel on me.
🌊 I am the source of waves.

ocean.question: I am a place in the ocean where many different sea creatures live together, made of tiny animals. What am I?

hints.text: 🏘️ I am like an underwater apartment complex.
🌈 I come in many bright colors.
🔨 Pollution is bad for me.

ocean.question: I am a large, round object that orbits Earth and causes tides in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Werewolves howl at me.
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.
🌑 I have phases, like waxing and waning.

ocean.question: I am a very deep and dark place in the ocean. Sunlight cannot reach me. What am I?

hints.text: 🔦 Creatures here often create their own light.
🕳️ It's the deepest part of the ocean.
🥶 The pressure here is immense.

ocean.question: I am a powerful current that starts near the equator and brings warm water towards Europe. What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 I influence the climate of many places.
🌡️ I help keep Europe warmer than it should be.
🌊 I am a large river of water within the ocean.
